sentences.en: All of this sparked a new level of market volatility.
sentences.cn: 这一切都引发了新一层次的市场波动.

sentences.en: In choosing perfume spice heat resisting , volatility and security should be considered.
sentences.cn: 香料的复配可使香味更具魅力.

sentences.en: In the third part, the model and method estimating volatility are discussed.
sentences.cn: 第三部分简要地介绍波动率估计中所用的模型和估计方法.

sentences.en: More price volatility is inevitable in the new regime.
sentences.cn: 在新体系中,更大的价格波动是不可避免的.

sentences.en: Price volatility is one of the basis characteristics of futures markets.
sentences.cn: 价格波动是期货市场最基本的特征之一.

sentences.en: Removing toxic assets would also reduce the volatility of banks'stock prices.
sentences.cn: 解毒资产也将减少的波动银行股票的价格.

sentences.en: Subsidies to home ownership have thus increased economic volatility.
sentences.cn: 对自有住房的补贴就是这样加大经济波动度的.

sentences.en: That was one reason why volatility was so low last year.
sentences.cn: 这也是去年波动性如此低的原因之一.

sentences.en: The Chicago Board Options Exchange Volatility Index sank 6.6 %.
sentences.cn: 芝加哥期权交易所波动率指数下跌了6.6%.

sentences.en: The True Range reflects overnight volatility by comparing today's and yesterday's prices.
sentences.cn: 真实波动幅度反映了今天和昨天的波动.

sentences.en: The Turtles were taught to measure volatility in terms of daily ranges.
sentences.cn: 海龟们被告知用日内振幅来计算.

sentences.en: The upheaval is blamed for recent stock market volatility across the globe.
sentences.cn: 这次危机因为近期造成全球股票市场的不稳定而备受指责.

sentences.en: This requires a trader to cut his positions when volatility rises.
sentences.cn: 这一方法要求交易员在波动性增强时平掉自己的头寸.

sentences.en: Volatility is an intrinsic characteristic of the security market.
sentences.cn: 波动性是证券市场的一项内在特征.

sentences.en: Volatility refers to the average daily range of your trading vehicle.
sentences.cn: 波动性指平均每天的波动范围.

words.tran_cn: [化学] 挥发性的；不稳定的；爆炸性的；反覆无常的

trans.tran_cn: 挥发性，挥发度，反复无常
